channel.title: 5 Second Question
channel.description:
How do i spawn [b]OBJECTS NOT ITEM? [/b]and also how do i make a shop wich i can open from a npc also i have this telport which is called pk and when i click it were the chatbox is this thing comes up saying which pk place do you wanna go to? varrock, edgville,mage bank how do i delte this teleport?
please help thanks :)

item.title: 5 Second Question
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

For adding an Object, for example use a stall right? You edit this in Client.Java on your Source folder, to add the actual object search for this… "makeGlobalObject, you should see something like this… This is my setup btw, but as you see, first number row = Coordx second = CoordY, third = Object ID fill in a 0 next (IDK what it is :)) also the 10… Make sure you use ::Mypos or know what coords your using for the object, otherwise it might endup somewhere else.

makeGlobalObject(3103, 9307, 2213, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3104, 9307, 2213, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3105, 9307, 2213, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3106, 9307, 2213, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2943, 3286, 2213, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2742, 3443, 2644, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2340, 3683, 9398, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2339, 3684, 9398, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2338, 3683, 9398, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2339, 3682, 9398, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2335, 3699, 2513, -2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2336, 3699, 2513, -2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2337, 3699, 2513, -2, 10); makeGlobalObject(3126, 3356, 2709, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2708, 5065, 10638, -1, 10);

For adding a shop… I would use someone that you can use the Trade option for, for example, Store Owner, go to Autospawn.cfg and add his coords and ID you want, should be simple I hope for you :), then make sure you add him to Shops.CFG, name it whatever you want, then add whatever you want to sell and the amount obviously…

Read full topic
